tweet: Honored to be selected by Chairman @ChuckGrassley to serve as chairman of @SenFinance's Subcommittee on Taxation and IRS Oversight. I’m proud that the work we’ve done is making life better for American families, and Republicans are going to continue working to expand opportunities for Americans even further. pic.twitter.com/U1SCyH9mgP

I joined @SenatorRounds and @RepDustyJohnson in introducing legislation that would help tribal schools prioritize resources to enhance students’ overall educational experience. https://www.thune.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/press-releases?ID=8774ABE2-ED4C-4FD2-A74B-7A09D12E6928 …

Today’s low in Aberdeen is 61 degrees colder than Saturday’s high, which is still expected to be below freezing (and those are just the air temps!). That’s cold, even by South Dakota standards. I hope everyone stays safe and warm through the remaining hours of #PolarVortex2019

My D.C., Aberdeen, Rapid City, and Sioux Falls offices are now accepting summer internship applications. If you're a college student looking to learn more about the legislative process, I encourage you to apply. More info ⬇️ https://www.thune.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/press-releases?ID=D200B1E2-3170-4F62-82E9-F326B7535471 …

Although we made great progress during the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act negotiations, the death tax still remains an unfair tax that punishes hard-working families. Read more on my bill that would repeal this onerous tax once and for all. https://www.thune.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=press-releases&id=1A7AA395-2D0D-46C7-B33A-983B72211368 …

Robocall scams are more than just a nuisance to folks, they’re a shameful tactic to prey on the vulnerable. My TRACED Act holds those people who participate in robocall scams accountable and does more to proactively protect consumers. More: https://www.thune.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=press-releases&id=AFD16860-99EE-4940-9926-E88826F963B2 …

Congratulations and best wishes to @govkristinoem on her inauguration day. With her leadership, South Dakota is in good hands. Also want to thank @SDGovDaugaard for his years of service to the state. He always put South Dakota first.

.@SenPatRoberts has been a terrific colleague and mentor, and his leadership on the Ag Committee has been second to none. Looking forward to all we can accomplish over the next two years, and I wish him well as he prepares for retirement after a long and distinguished career.
